divs: Sighting DetailsSitting on back deck, when a large, orange-colored object appeared in the east, traveling west. No noise. Looked very similar to a Chinese lantern at first, but traveled too fast and kept a constant, unwavering course. Very similar in appearance to 2-such objects observed in July. However, those noted in July were bright red, rather than orange.
Summary: just a large glowing, silent light
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Georgetown
There were no other sightings in Georgetown on or around August 24th 2013
